effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 869,632 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 321,222.

spells.description:
Use: Become Mudborne, absorbing 9.2 million damage and pulsing 454,535 Nature damage split between nearby enemies over 10 sec.

Periodic damage you take coalesces into pungent mud to feed the ritual, reducing this cooldown by 2.0 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 113,169 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.
